summary: An individual's manipulative actions to exploit others for personal gain ultimately led to their own downfall when they were deceived in a similar manner.
The individual who thrived on deceiving others became a victim of deception themselves, highlighting the ironic twist of experiencing the same fate they imposed on others.
The individual's insatiable desire for wealth blinded them to obvious warning signs, resulting in their financial ruin and illustrating the peril of unchecked greed.
The individual faced a form of poetic justice as their past misdeeds caught up with them, serving as a moral lesson on the eventual consequences of unethical behavior.
